lines.text: How could you do this to me?
Because I'm in love with you!
Ha! What kind of an excuse is that?
The only problem is me because I'm in love with her. I love her more than she'll ever know. But... you're a lucky, lucky man. You've got the right name! Goodbye Faith. Hope you two work it out.
I can't believe you're gonna let a few little letters of the alphabet keep us apart. It is a detail! Just - look, just call me Damon, okay? It'll be like a nickname.

This guy, by the way, could be the biggest loser who ever walked the face of the earth. He could be a grump, a jerk, a pervert, a cynic, a man who's mind is infested with dark thoughts, he could be a criminal... he could be... truly sick.

[Faith and Peter are kissing passionately]
There's something I have to tell you.
There's nothing you could tell me that would change the way I feel about you.
I'm engaged. We're due to be married, in 9 days.

[alarmed]
Whoa, whoa! Except possibly that. Wait a second, what?
You know him. Dwayne. When you called the other night, that was me on the phone.

[getting really worked up and freaked out]
What? Dwayne?
But I thought I'd never find you!
[kisses him again]
I understand.
[melts into her arms]
Why couldn't we just have arranged marriages in America?
Yeah, at least you could spend the rest of your life blaming your parents instead of yourself.
Realistically, like, what are the odds that he's, like, some extra super double terrific guy.
10 billion to one?
Exactly.
I was born to kiss you.
I married a liar. Why? Because I married a man.
Sweet of her, wasn't it?
If I had a dress like that, I'd give it away too.
He was eccentric, and not in a good way!
You mean like in your way?
You said whatever it was that you'd understand.
That's before I knew what it was!

[Faith is parading up and down in the wedding dress humming the wedding march]
Does it come with a soundtrack?

[after Harry Elbows him on the nose]
Jesus, Harry!
